Plot: Young nurse Sissi lives a secluded life, seemingly entirely devoted to her patients at Birkenhof asylum. Her first encounter with ex-soldier and drifter Bodo has a lasting impact. He causes...
Title: The Princess and the Warrior
Actors: Franka Potente, Benno Fürmann, Joachim Król, Lars Rudolph
tomatoConsensus: More slow-moving than Run Lola Run, this film nonetheless offers an intriguing storyline about love and fate.
